typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (movieid as string, year as integer, rating as integer, genres as string[], title as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source1 derive(movies = @(movieid=movies.movieid,
		title=reverse(movies.title),
		genres=movies.genres,
		year=movies.year,
		rating=movies.rating)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(instr(reverse(lower(movies.title)),'toy story') > 0)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
